analyzed: dvādaśa ye ṅga viśeṣāḥ muninā uddiṣṭāḥ pratītyasambhūtāḥ
te kleśa karma duḥkheṣu saṅgṛhītāḥ triṣu yathāvat

original: ādyāṣṭamanavamāḥ syuḥ kleśāḥ karma dvitīyadaśamau ca /
analyzed: ādya aṣṭama navamāḥ syuḥ kleśāḥ karma dvitīya daśamau ca

original: śeṣāḥ sapta ca duḥkhaṃ trisaṅgrahā dvādaśa tu dharmāḥ // Pshk_2 //
analyzed: śeṣāḥ sapta ca duḥkham tri saṅgrahāḥ dvādaśa tu dharmāḥ

original: tribhyo bhavati dvandvaṃ dvandvātprabhavanti sapta saptabhyaḥ /
analyzed: tribhyaḥ bhavati dvandvam dvandvāt prabhavanti sapta saptabhyaḥ

original: traya udbhavanti bhūyastadeva[tu] bhramati bhavacakram // Pshk_3 //
analyzed: trayaḥ udbhavanti bhūyas tat eva tu bhramati bhava cakram
hetu phalam ca hi sarvam jagat anyaḥ na asti kaścid iha sattvaḥ

original: śūnyebhya eva śūnyā dharmāḥ prabhavanti dharmebhyaḥ // Pshk_4 //
analyzed: śūnyebhyaḥ eva śūnyāḥ dharmāḥ prabhavanti dharmebhyaḥ
svādhyāya dīpa mudrā darpaṇa ghoṣa rka kānta bīja amlaiḥ
skandha pratisandhiḥ asaṅkramaḥ ca vidvadbhiḥ avadhāryau
yaḥ ucchedam prakalpayati ati sūkṣme vastuni
pratītyasambhavasya artham avijñaḥ sa na paśyati
na apaneyam atas kiñcid prakṣepyam nā api kiñcana

original: draṣṭavyaṃ bhūtato bhūtaṃ bhūtadarśī vimucyate // Pshk_7 //
analyzed: draṣṭavyam bhūtataḥ bhūtam bhūta darśī vimucyate
pratītyasamutpāda hṛdaya kārikā ācārya nāgārjuna kṛtā samāptā
